legacy.full_text: The negative impact of the ocean discharge cannot be undone. We don’t want August 24, 2023 to be a disaster day for marine environment. If Japan does not change course, it must bear the historic responsibility for this decision. https://t.co/n9dIBQzd2T

legacy.name: Wang Xiaojian

legacy.full_text: China strongly urges Japan to stop its wrongdoing, cancel the ocean discharge plan, communicate with neighboring countries with sincerity and good will, dispose of the nuclear-contaminated water in a responsible manner and accept rigorous international oversight. https://t.co/99etkeLfmc

legacy.name: Wang Xiaojian

legacy.full_text: China has indisputable sovereignty over the Nanhai Zhudao (islands in the South China Sea) & the adjacent waters. As a state party to the UNCLOS, China always abides by int'l law including UNCLOS & does not accept or recognize the illegal arbitral award on the South China Sea. https://t.co/mHRSPh2ojX
